thread.section_title: Egerton House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic service!!
thread.title_full: Fantastic service!! - Review of Egerton House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: julie t
title: Fantastic service!!
text: Went for a Champagne afternoon tea which was amazing the food was fresh and tasted amazing! We were so well looked after by Juan, Joao and Ali who were always willing to provide excellent customer service and take care of anything we asked of them. Staff were fantastic which complements the great food! Well worth a visit
